# saleshq.ai

> SalesHQ is an AI-powered sales enablement platform that transcribes calls live, surfaces instant suggestions, and connects to your product knowledge—helping reps respond faster and close more deals.

This website contains 11 documented pages with information about saleshq.ai.

## Docs

- [SalesHQ – Real-Time AI Sales Assistant](https://www.saleshq.ai/): SalesHQ is an AI-powered sales enablement platform that transcribes calls live, surfaces instant suggestions, and connects to your product knowledge—helping reps respond faster and close more deals.
